resources.string: Press on color below to apply
Customize the animations of each window in system
Recents Style, Hide Apps from Recents
Move display content when device is in motion
Wake device on volume button press
Enables the advanced reboot menu for rebooting options
Enable the ability to show and use the power menu dialog while on the lockscreen
Show the reboot option on the lockscreen
Show the advanced reboot option on the lockscreen
Show the screenshot option on the lockscreen
Show the airplane mode option on the lockscreen
This is test for selected toast animation
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Disables quick settings on secure lockscreen
Select certian apps to hide in recents
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Display icon of activity that generates toast message
Disable to remove ripple when entering pin numbers
Disable power menu on lock screen
This will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Wake up device if charger is plugged/unplugged.
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Unlock device with fingerprint after reboot without PIN/Password/Pattern\nNote: at your own risk!
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Customize the battery icon in statusbar
Show the network traffic indicator arrows
Show a brightness slider on bottom quick settings
Customize clock and date in statusbar
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Display a warning at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or vpn
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Leave the above values as it is if you don\'t understand what they mean.
Show visualizer on lockscreen when music is playing
Requires media cover art on lockscreen enabled
Use a smooth lava lamp style color blend animation
Shift navbar and statusbar icons to prevent burn-in
Display Running Services icon in quick settings footer
Display Settings icon in quick settings footer
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
Show the brightness slider underneath quick settings
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put phone to sleep
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
Shows information on top of the QS panel
Shows a drag handle at the bottom of QS
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Display the tile edit icon in quick settings footer
Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Show the clock widget on the lockscreen
Show the date, weather, alarms and zen on the lockscreen
These are power saving features. They may interfere with services intended to run at idle, like navigation apps. You can whitelist these apps from being affected in the app battery settings.
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
Seek music tracks by long pressing the volume keys while the display is off
Enables Custom filter when powermenu is active
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Allow to customize Gaming Mode options
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will automatically be turned on for the selected apps
Block all headsup messages except calls
Disable hardware buttons when Gaming mode is turned on
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on
Whenever you open any app and the system finds it to be a game, it will be added in gaming list automatically. Please note that this does not work for every game app.
Enable to use an alternative recents screen
Customize the additional settings for slim recents
Clear recents by long-pressing the memory bar
Apply a custom icon pack for apps in the panel
Image to show when no recent apps
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Apps to not show in the panel
Tap here to add, tap on added app to remove it
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Choose apps to show in the sidebar
Configure the content of the app sidebar
Change the look of the sidebar
Reduce recents opening lag by disabling this
